metadata.feature_description: Report inappropriate wiki articles or comments to moderators

steps.action: Navigate to a published wiki article
steps.expected: Article page loads with Report link visible
steps.actual: Article page 'Published Test Article - Jan 16 2026' loaded with Report link visible in the tags/actions area

steps.expected: Report dialog opens with reason options
steps.actual: Report content dialog opened with 4 reason options: It is low-quality, It is spam, It does not belong here, Other

steps.action: Submit report with 'It is low-quality' reason
steps.expected: Report submitted successfully with confirmation message
steps.actual: Success message displayed: 'Thank you for reporting this content, moderators have been notified of your submission.'

steps.action: Locate a comment on the article and click Report option
steps.actual: Report a comment dialog opened with the same 4 reason options as article report

steps.action: Select 'It is spam' reason and submit
steps.actual: Success message displayed and notification popup appeared showing 'Comment Reported: Published Test Article...' with 'Reason: It is spam'

steps.action: Report article with 'It is low-quality' reason
steps.actual: Article report submitted with 'It is low-quality' reason, verified in moderator notification

steps.action: Report comment with 'It is spam' reason
steps.actual: Comment report submitted with 'It is spam' reason, verified in moderator notification

steps.action: Check notification badge after submitting reports
steps.expected: Notification badge shows count of reports
steps.actual: Notification badge displayed '2' indicating both article and comment reports generated notifications

steps.expected: Both report notifications visible with moderator actions
steps.actual: Notifications page shows: 1) 'Comment Reported: Published Test Article - Jan 16 2026' with Reason: It is spam and actions Delete Comment | Reject | Dismiss; 2) 'Article Reported: Published Test Article - Jan 16 2026' with Reason: It is low-quality and actions Delete | Reject | Dismiss

observations: The Report feature is accessible from the article detail view, located in the tags area below the article content
Comments have a Report option in their action menu (Reply | Like | Report)
Report dialog offers 4 standard reasons: Low quality, Spam, Doesn't belong here, and Other
The 'Other' option shows a textarea for custom reason text, though this was not tested in detail
Notifications are sent immediately upon report submission as confirmed by the popup notification
Moderator notifications include the report reason, author information, and actionable options (Delete, Reject, Dismiss)
Code confirms scoring points are awarded: FlaggedArticle/FlaggedComment for reporter, ProvidedFlaggedArticleEdit/ProvidedFlaggedComment for content author
